metadataAttributes.Title: The Manager's Toolkit: A Practical Guide to Managing People at Work
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: The aim of this course is to give you a practical guide to managing people at work. It does not matter whether you are a first time manager in a shop or a middle manager in an office environment; the same skills apply to every work place. In the course you will engage with some HR theories and then see how they translate into every day working life.
